#summary Anterior Nucleus of Thalamus

This page covers biological details of component Anterior Nucleus of Thalamus.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Forebrain Diencephalon -> Thalamus (FD.TH) -> Anterior Nucleus of Thalamus (HBA.FD.TH.AN)(see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaHBA Hippocampus Basal Area]
  * *function*: Extended hippocampal system
  * *Notes to function*: Projects to L4 of presubiculum and receives from postsubiculum, also to CG, RSP; spatial learning and memory; attentional processes; head direction
